name: spreader
content:
spreader noun [C]
(EQUIPMENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a vehicle or piece of machinery for spreading something somewhere: Tractors pulling manure spreaders drove through town. People walked back and forth across their lawns behind fertilizer spreaders.
an object used for spreading a substance on a surface: For the tiling you will need grout and a flexible spreader. The less expensive items on the wedding list included a cheese knife, and a butter spreader.
a tool for spreading two parts or things apart: Surgeons would make a long incision between the ribs and expand the opening with a rib spreader.

spreader noun [C]
(PERSON)
someone who infects other people with a virus, bacterium, etc.: Children are notorious germ spreaders. Some people recover from the initial illness but remain carriers and spreaders of the disease for the rest of their lives. See also
super-spreader
